title: News24.com | Not just our lives threatened by virus, but our livelihoods – DA on extended lockdown
description: The DA is in sharp disagreement with President Cyril Ramphosa's decision to extend the country's lockdown.
content:
The DA is in sharp disagreement with President Cyril Ramaphosa's decision to extend the country's lockdown.
Other political parties mostly welcomed the decision announced on Thursday night.  
Ramaphosa said the lockdown, which was due to end 16 April would … [+3718 chars]
